SEARCH
Package entity.domain

Class OpportunityFilter

java.lang.Object
entity.domain.OpportunityFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpportunityFilterCriteria
public class OpportunityFilter extends Object implements OpportunityFilterCriteria
Per-user filter for browsing internship opportunities. Any null/empty field is treated as "no filter".
